accounts.name: user
docs: user to which the spl token must go to, checks in position manager

accounts.name: signer
docs: signer is the strategy account whose escrow account is the maker of the order

accounts.name: user
docs: user to which the spl token must go to, checks in position manager

accounts.name: signer
docs: signer is the strategy account whose escrow account is the maker of the order

errors.name: NextDueLedgerAccountInvalid
errors.msg: Next due ledger account is invalid.

errors.name: LastDueLedgerAccountInvalid
errors.msg: Last due ledger account is invalid.

errors.name: LedgerAccountsNotConsecutive
errors.msg: Ledger accounts passed in are not consecutive.

errors.name: WrongProgramCPI
errors.msg: Cpi program expected to be right

errors.name: UserRoleAccountInvalid
errors.msg: User role account is invalid.

errors.name: FeeAccountAddress
errors.msg: Fee account address is invalid.

errors.name: DesignatedTakerCannotBeMaker
errors.msg: Designated taker cannot be the same as the maker.

errors.name: InsufficientCollateral
errors.msg: Insufficient collateral in the escrow account.

errors.name: InsufficientPrincipal
errors.msg: Insufficient principal in the escrow account.

errors.name: StakeAccountInvalid
errors.msg: Stake account is invalid.

errors.name: EscrowEventMathError
errors.msg: Over/underflow error on Escrow Event creation.

errors.name: InvalidLedgerId
errors.msg: Invalid ledger id

errors.name: InvalidLedgerIdOrder
errors.msg: Ledger id order is invalid

errors.name: LoanDefaulted
errors.msg: Loan is defaulted

errors.name: CouldntFindLastDueLedgerAccount
errors.msg: Couldnt find the last due ledger account

errors.name: CouldntFindNextDueLedgerAccount
errors.msg: Couldnt find the next due ledger account

errors.name: EscrowAccountInvalid
errors.msg: Escrow account is invalid

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow

errors.name: InvalidOrderLedgers
errors.msg: Invalid order ledgers

errors.name: RefinancePrincipalAmountTooLow
errors.msg: Refinance order principal amount too low

errors.name: InvalidLender
errors.msg: Refinance loan lender wrong

errors.name: ExternalYieldAlreadyEnabled
errors.msg: External yield is already enabled for this escrow

errors.name: MissingBorrowerCollateralTa
errors.msg: missing borrower collateral ta

errors.name: NoteAlreadyMinted
errors.msg: Attempting to mint note that's already minted

errors.name: NoteAlreadRedeemed
errors.msg: Attempting to redeem note that's already redeem

errors.name: AccountNotMatching
errors.msg: Account doesn't match borrower or lender

types.name: EditLedgerAccountParams
docs: * This ix is to be called by the BE to process early repayments and handle amortization cases

types.name: EscrowAccount
docs: Escrow account to keep track of user's escrowed assets

fields.name: organization_identifier
docs: organization that owns the escrow account

fields.name: num_escrowed
docs: DEPRECATED AND NOT UPDATED number of escrowed assets

fields.name: nonce
docs: nonce for potentially supporting multiple escrows/user. For now this will always be default pubkey

fields.name: origination_cap
docs: origination cap, set to u64 MAX if no cap

fields.name: buffer_1
docs: buffer for potential future use, 112 bytes, 64 + 32 + 16 = 112

types.name: FeeAccountParams
docs: * This ix is to be called by the BE to add a fee payment based from off-chain logic

fields.name: use_recipient_escrow
docs: send principal to recipient escrow. If false, will send to filler. Debt note is still always sent to escrow.

types.name: Ledger
docs: Ledger Account to keep track of repayment schedule

fields.name: ledger_id
docs: integer ID of the payment, increments starting with 1

fields.name: principal_due
docs: key of the order this charge is used for
principal amount owed for this payment

fields.name: principal_repaid
docs: principal amount paid back to this payment

fields.name: interest_repaid
docs: interest amount paid back to this payment

fields.name: is_filled
docs: whether or not the payments have been made for this account

fields.name: late_payment_fee
docs: late payment fee on ledger, bps of outstadning

fields.name: early_payment_fee
docs: early payment fee on ledger, bps of early payment

fields.name: payment_window
docs: payment window for when a payment is counted as early

fields.name: debt_note
docs: this is the mint of the nft that is minted to the borrower's escrow account

fields.name: credit_note
docs: this is the mint of the nft that is minted to the lender's escrow account
holding this will allow the lender to claim the collateral if the borrower does not repay

fields.name: credit_claimed
docs: has the collateral been right claimed by the lender

fields.name: debt_claimed
docs: borrower has repaid the loan and claimed back the obligation

fields.name: fees_received
docs: amount of fees received, used in credit claim

fields.name: buffer_0
docs: buffer for potential future use, need to split up 120 bytes

fields.name: buffer_1
docs: buffer for potential future use, need to split up 120 bytes

fields.name: buffer_2
docs: buffer for potential future use, need to split up 120 bytes

fields.name: loan_credit_claimed
docs: has the collateral been right claimed by the lender

fields.name: loan_debt_claimed
docs: borrower has repaid the loan and claimed back the obligation

fields.name: designated_taker
docs: this can be set to default to allow the order to be filled by any user

fields.name: max_outstanding_payments
docs: max outstanding payments accepted until order is defaulted

fields.name: last_payment_id
docs: id of the last ledger account for which payment has been made

fields.name: final_payment_id
docs: id of the final ledger account for which payment has to be made for

fields.name: liquidation_manager
docs: this is the authority that has the ability to liquidate the loan once it is marked as default

fields.name: market_manager
docs: this is the authority that has the ability to mark a loan as defaulted based on external oracles

fields.name: liquidation_threshold
docs: this is the minimum (loan value / collateral value at any point) * 10_000 * 100, below which the loan will be liquidated

types.name: RoleAccount
docs: Role account to keep track of user roles.
If a user has multiple roles then they have multiple role accounts.
Each ix will require a set of role accounts, all of which must  be passed in.
e.g to create borrow order oyu need the borrower role.
The created account is the proof or role, to remove a role close the role account.
